uuid.description: The unique identifier of the role.

itemType.description: The type of object.  In this case, a role.

revision.description: The revision number of the object.  This is used for version management.

prefix.description: Prefix of the role (Mr., Mrs., etc.)

firstName.description: First name of the character role.

middleName.description: Middle name of the character role.

lastName.description: Last name of the character role.

slug.description: The machine-name "slug" of the role to use in its canonical URL.

images.description: A list of uuids of the image object associated to this role.

links.description: A List of objects containing URL and text title of link associated to the role.
